name: Vcrud
tagline: An easy to use development framework based on Spring, JPA and Vaadin
body:
### Welcome to Vcrud Project.
Vcrud is an easy to use development framework based on Spring and JPA, with a CRUD configurable administration implmented with Vaadin.

```
$ git clone git://github.com/ddelizia/vcrud.git
```

### Authors and Contributors
This framework has been developed by Danilo Delizia, if you are interested in contrubuting to this project please contact me.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Vcrud? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/ddelizia/vcrud/wiki or contact ddelizia@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
